award_title: I-Corps: Translation Potential of an Innovative Cooling Software for Efficient Data Centers
subject: Tools for your data center research group
body:
Hi Dr. Zuo,

I'm building Ouro, a platform where computational researchers publish working tools (datasets, analysis scripts, APIs) that others can plug directly into their own workflows. Less time recreating methods from papers, more time on the actual science.

Given your work on data center cooling optimization software, I thought it might be useful for your grad students and postdocs. Publishing tools builds their reputation before they're on the job market. A student's tool getting used by other labs is a powerful career asset.

Let me know if you'd like to take it for a spin.

Best,

Matt
Founder
https://ouro.foundation
